MedicalAppSecurityRequirements:
SEC-01
 All data transmitted or stored must be encrypted using AES 256-bit encryption.
 
 
 SEC-02
 Data sharing features must be disabled by default.
 
 

 
 
 LOG-01
 All access logs and system event logs should be encrypted and stored for at least a year.
 
 
 AUD-01
 Automatically generate audit reports every month outlining all changes in user permissions.
 
 

 
 
 UAC-01
 Implement strong authentication mechanisms, such as multi-factor authentication (MFA).
